11.title: Male Character

choices: Gavino Heroesworth, the Transfer Student for Class 1A
111.content:
DISCLAIMER: This is the author's OC and path for this story! So congrats as the author will try and make this as decent as possible. And may I include that using the name Gavino for my OCs is something I do constantly, regardless of the story or genre. Mainly because I have big plans over on Fanfiction.net with him.

Anywho, character!

Name: Gavino Paul Heroesworth
Age: 15
Birthday: January 23rd
Quirk: Mass Changer and Perfect Copy (0 Quirks Perfect Copied)

Description:

Gavino has dark brown hair that is small but also somewhat medium sized. If one were to describe his hair style as a combination of the characters in MHA, one might decline his hair as a combination of Hanta Sero's and also Izuku Midoriya's, for Gavino's hair is short and also somewhat wild. He stands at 5'9, and has a somewhat muscular build.

Gavino is your average student. He is a person looking to be a hero like many others amongst his grade and amongst his class. At the age of 9, he had messed up in life due to accidental use of his Mass Changer Quirk and most kids had either feared or insulted him since. Gavino has grown to be a shy, lonely, and depressed man for his age. Though under that is a determined, funny, and energetic teen waiting to show the world what he can do.

Clothing wise, he wears white shirts and also blue or black jeans normally. He wears white socks and also old worn down shoes of a brand long since forgotten. He doesn't comb his hair or even put hair gel in it, as he would say it gives him individuality compared to everyone else, even though he's already unique since he was born with two Quirks.

Family: (They will not be making appearances in this interactive. They never will, but they will be mentioned.)
A Mother
A Father
3 Brothers
4 Sisters

Stats (This is also hindered and undetermined due to being able to copy any quirk, besides the ones listed in the story's description, which makes all but Intelligence and Cooperation different. Official stats for Gavino will be given by the end of each chapter while listing his Quirks that he currently has):

Power: ?/6
Speed: ?/6
Technique: ?/6
Intelligence: 6/6
Cooperation: 3/6

Now that you've learn about Gavino Heroesworth, who is from America and wants to attend UA in Japan after fluently learning Japanese, let's see how he does in the world of My Hero Academia!
111.title: Character Bio: Gavino Heroesworth

choices: "Come on, we'll show you to the classroom."
"Let's go to the dorms real quick. Then you can meet everyone."
"So... what's your Quirk?" Izuku asked. "Yeah, what is it?" Ochaco also asked.
1111.content:
"Oh great... it's him," a American female student said.

"Why is he here? I thought you said he never comes this way!" A Japanese male student exclaimed. "Why is he coming here?!"

"Wait, why is he in a new uniform?" A Japanese female student asked.

Gavino was consciously aware of the five students that were hiding in a back alleyway until he passed. He was tempted to flip them off and brag about his new school. Sadly, that cocky and arrogant attitude left a while ago, so he couldn't bring himself to do it. He'd rather go to a school like UA where no one has heard of him and become a student there.

Oh wait, he is a student at UA. He smiled to himself as he walked to the train station so he could catch a train that would take him to UA. He knew he could have just copied a teleportation Quirk, like that Kurogiri dude's Warp Gate, but he felt that he should approach his new school like he already goes there, and also was an average student.

Gavino made it to the station and smiled as he boarded the train that would take him to UA, or at least closer to UA. As he looked for a place to sit on the empty train that was basically empty, he then reminisced on how he built up the guts to ask to enroll into UA via a entrance exam.

Flashback (Two Weeks Ago)


Gavino sat in the chair that was right in front of the principal of UA, Nezu, who Gavino believed was a rat, dog, and bear hybrid mixed into one. The Rogear (the name Gavino gave to whatever Nezu's species is) was currently looking at the file for Gavino, and was slightly in awe.

"Young man, I have to say you are very impressive," Nezu complimented. "I have never seen a Quirk as powerful as yours until today, besides maybe All Might's and Midoriya's."

"T-thank you sir," Gavino thanked.

Nezu then frowned. "Though if I may ask, why does this file have some Quirk information crossed out?"

Gavino then looked down at the ground. He knew he'd have to talk about it. He didn't want to at all.

"Well... I wasn't born with my Perfect Copy Quirk alone..." Gavino admitted. "I... was born with what seemed to be a good secondary Quirk, but it only causes problems. Which is also why I tend to wear gloves that don't have holes like knitted gloves. Prevents me from using it."

"You speak of your other Quirk like it's a curse," Nezu noted.

"It might as well be..." Gavino looked at the ground, remembering the day from his fourth grade year, and shuddering as he remembered the scene.

Gavino then explained his Quirk, Mass Changer, to Nezu. He told him about the accident that labeled him as a outcast in his school district, and also made him loss what little friends he had. Nezu nodded and listened.

"Well, we all have are dark moments in life, and it's clear you''ve had your midlife crisis early," Nezu assested.

Gavino nodded. "Besides from wanting to get away from those rude pricks, and their... crap, I want to try and become a hero and assist as many people as I can! UA is maybe the place I could get the most benefit out of to achieve that goal, and also because I've heard rumors of a very disliked kid in one of the classes. I've been wondering about that for a while and I might be able to help the kids by replacing that student."

Nezu considered it for a moment, and then came to a decision. "Okay, Mr, Heroesworth. I'll see what Eraserhead and the other teachers will say about you, see if they'll consider the removal of the student who've you heard rumors about, and then I'll make a decision whether to welcome you to UA."

"When you talk to the teachers... could you leave out the bad details of Mass Changer? I just... want to start off fresh for a first time," Gavino asked.

"Don't worry. I'll just say you have a second Quirk that you'd rather keep a secret and I work things out from there," Nezu said.

From that day, Gavino waited 1 week and 5 days and recovered confirmation of one thing.

"Welcome, to your Hero Academia, Young Heroesworth!" A skeletal man said while looking into a camera and also opening his hand out wide. Gavino cried tears of joy that night, and was happy beyond what he's experienced before.

Present


"Oh hey, are you a student from UA?" A male voice called out. Gavino turned and saw a boy with green messy hair a freckles decorating his cheeks right under his eyes, who was followed by a girl with brown hair. Both wore a outfit similar to his.

"Um... Yeah!" Gavino said. "Are you?"

"Yep," the green haired boy said. "I'm Izuku Midoriya. Pleased to meet you."

"I'm Ochaco Uraraka. I'm in the same class as Deku," the brown haired girl introduced.

"Oh, um, I'm Gavino Heroesworth. I'm a transfer student from outside of UA," Gavino introduced. "Um... Do you happen to know where Class 1A might be located since you both go to UA?"

"Wait, you're the transfer student Mr. Aizawa told us about?" Ochaco asked. "Then that means we're classmates! We're also in Class 1A."

"Ah..." Gavino wasn't excited if their teacher told the class about him. But he wasn't excited if they knew about his history, though they didn't know from what he could tell.

"Yeah! We're honestly kind of glad that you' do arrived when you did," Izuku followed. "Mineta was getting more bold with his perry attempts everyday."

"Having you would probably be better than having Mineta," Ochaco informed.

Gavino didn't know what the feeling he had in his chest currently was, but he knew it was something to do with feeling wanted, instead of unwanted.

The train stopped after several more minutes of travel and Isuku and Ochaco got up from their seats and made their way out of the train. Gavino grabbed his stuff and he followed them.

As they made their way onto UA grounds, Gavino being awestruck by the place, Izuku looked at Gavino and said...
1111.title: Meet Izuku and Ochaco. The First Step Into UA!

choices: Mina, who was ready to apologize to him.
Katsuki, who was about to insult him. (Gavino&Katsuki rivalry)
Mr. Aizawa and Nezu, both shocked at what has happened in the room.
11112.content:
"So, let's go to the dorms," Izuku said to Ochaco and Gavino. "That way you can meet everyone."

Gavino was confused. "Wait, don't you guys have classes today?"

Ochaco and Izuku exchanged a glance and looked back at Gavino. Izuku rubbed the back of his head with a goofy smile on his face. "We would if Kacchan didn't nearly accidentally kill All Might, who is in the infirmary for the time being. So we have the day off," Izuku explained.

"Wait, somebody nearly killed All Might?!" Gavino exclaimed.

"Yeah, but All Might can't really dodge or do all the incredible things he did when he was the Symbol of Peace, since now he's basically Quirkless," Izuku informed.

Gavino nodded. He wondered if All Might was still able to use his power, but now he had confirmation that All Might couldn't. But, Gavino then had an idea that he'd need to test at a later date.

A few minutes of walking they made it to the dorms for Class 1A. Gavino then opened the door and said, "HAHA, I AM YOUR-!"

He was going to say, "HAHA, I AM YOUR NEW TRANSFER STUDENT!", but he was then sprayed in his eyes by a grey liquid which resulted in Gavino saying, "AH! MY FUCKING EYES!" He then put his hands to his eyes as he fell to the floor.

Izuku and Ochaco stared wide eyed at Gavino in shock as he sprouted off a bunch of cuss words, and they looked up and their jaws hit the floor.

Currently, there were holes in the walls that each had a grey substance on them, and also holes in the floor. The room was filled with half of Class 1A and they all were standing still. Currently Mina, Hanta, Denki, Toru, Tsuyu, and also Kyoka were holding what appeared to be spray guns filled with the same grey substance, with Mina currently holding her spray gun at where Gavino's face was and her eyes were opened in shock.

The room was silent besides Gavino's strands of cussing, which made Tenya appear.

"Okay, what is going-JESUS, WHAT HAPPENED IN HERE?!" Tenya questioned as he saw the situation. "Is that a person on the floor?!"

"You bet damn well I'm a person!" Gavino growled. "And I'm going to find whoever the hell sprayed Acid in my god damned face, and I will make them pay in blood!"

Mina then eeped and she immediately ran for the back door exit, along with Denki and Hanta. The other three girls just stood there in shock with the mouths opened.

"Damn, I hate regenerating eyes, fuck!" Gavino exclaimed as he stood up and ripped out his eyes from their sockets, two new ones appearing. A glow in his hands and the eye balls he held were gone. He looked around the room and asked, "Who was the asshole who wants divine wrath struck upon them?!"

"Hmm... he has a regenerations Quirk, what appears to be super strength if he can rip out his eyes without screaming or just great mental control, and also a violent nature," Izuku mumbled as he started writing things about Gavino in his Quirk Analysis notebook.

"Um... Maybe we should calm down before we do something rash, kero," suggested Tsuyu.

"...Okay, but I want an apology from the asshole who basically bleached by eyes," Gavino said.

"Hmph, I'll go get Mina," Kyoka announced as she went to find Mina.

Gavino stretched and rubbed his eyes. "Damn, that hurt like a bitch."

"So, you have a regeneration Quirk?" Tsuyu asked.

"No," Gavino answered. "I have a Perfect Copy Quirk."

"Perfect Copy Quirk, can copy regeneration Quirks," Izuku mumbled while he erased what he wrote and replaced it with a new analysis.

"...Is he okay?" Gavino asked.

"Yes, Deku just does that. He's trying to break that habit, so just deal with it until he breaks the habit," Ochaco said.

"Ah, that's... kinda weird and cool since he looks like he's writing something about Quirks and mumbling about Quirks," Gavino said.

"How did you know Midoriya was writing about Quirks?" Tenya asked Gavino.

"Well, judging by the way he's moving his pencil, he's writing about how I can copy regeneration Quirks while trying to guess what other Quirks I can copy," Gavino answered while also watching Izuku's hand, calculating the strokes and lines Izuku's made with that pencil.

Izuku rose an eyebrow in surprise as that basically sums up what he was writing. "Add that I have two Birth-Quirks, one that none of you will ever know, and the other which is Perfect Copy and also allows me to copy another extra Quirk every 2 years," Gavino informed. Izuku was just writing about the two years equal one new Perfect Copy Quirk when he realized something and the whole room shouted spit at the same time.

"YOU WERE BORN WITH TWO QUIRKS?!" The room exclaimed at Gavino.

Gavino looked at the ground and heard a door open. He instinctively turned and he saw...
11112.title: The New Student's Arrival! "AH, MY FUCKING EYES!"

choices: A) Asking one of the other students to help him.
B) Going to school grounds and finding his home room teacher.
C) Wait until later and start singing English songs in the roof by himself.
111121.content:
...Mina, with Kyoka behind her. Kaminari and Sero were as well but they were hiding behind a wall.

Gavino could already tell based off of the look on Mina's face that she was the one who sprayed his eyes with acid and pretty much destroyed them. Gavino's eyes narrowed as she walked up to him, and the room became deathly silent.

No one spoke for a minute, with Gavino staring at Mina and Mina staring at Gavino. It was roughly 10 minutes since this awkward silence began that Mina sighed and said, "I'm sorry for burning your eyes... and destroying them..."

Gavino found the apology somewhat laughable, but he's had more laughable moments in life. So with he simply held out his hand and said, "Apology Accepted." It was as Mina shook his hand that Gavino added, "Just never do that again, and also never do whatever the hell you did to this room. It looks like a fucking mess!"

"Um..." Mina looked around and saw that she did kinda destroy the room, with everyone else that was partaking in the event that resulted into the walls being destroyed by acid. "Yeah, maybe we should do this outside instead."

"Or never in general, and maybe, I don't know, use water," Gavino said sarcastically, the two of them ending the handshake. "I mean, who the hell uses an acid Quirk and doesn't think about the safety of others and the area they are in. Oh wait, you."

Mina just stared at him for a moment and then asked, "Do you have anger issues?"

"Are you carefree and potential deadly should you choose to use your Quirk the wrong way?" Gavino countered.

"Good point," Mina said. "Oh, I don't think we've introduce ourselves. I'm Mina Ashido."

"I'm Gavino Heroesworth," Gavino introduced. "Now, I got some exploring to do." Gavino then walked off faster than anyone could see, and he went up a set of stairs that Iida had appeared from.

"And that's a speed Quirk. Good to know he can copy those," Izuku muttered as he mumbled about Gavino's Perfect Copy Quirk.

"Wonder why he left to go up the stairs," Kaminari said as he and Sero approached the rest of Class 1A.

"Probably to find his room, since he is the new student," Iida suggested logically.

"Maybe he just doesn't know how to talk with people and is rather shy around people, maybe in a large cluster like this, kero," Tsuyu said.

"He didn't really seem shy," Mina said. "If anything, he's like one of those kids that do things they shouldn't do but knows when to stop."

"AND THAT'S SOMETHING YOU AREN'T!" Gavino shouted from up the stairs.

"And potentially a hearing Quirk," Izuku mumbled again.

"Honestly, we shouldn't judge him from his first appearance and also act. He did just have his eyes destroyed," Ochaco said thoughtfully.

"Why's that Ochaco?" Mina asked, a teasing smile spreading onto her face. "You like him already?"

"I thought we were pairing her with Midoriya," Tsuyu whispered to Mina.

Mina then whispered back, "It's called teasing for a reason!"

"True, kero."
______________________________________________________

Meanwhile Gavino was sitting on the fourth floor in a corner, mumbling the word crap repeatedly.

Gavino was scared that he already fucked up and getting his reset done correctly. Did he already make them think he was weird? Did they already make fun of him? Are they trying to figure out his curse he called a birth Quirk? Gavino was scared out of his mind, and he was sure he fucked up any chances at getting friends.

He could live with people fearing him, but all he really wanted was a actual friend. Maybe he could be friends with Izuku and Ochaco and everything could try getting better from there. But with the amount of uncertainty around his future, Gavino silently prayed to the Greek/Roman God of Prophecy known as Apollo that he would get a good future.

Gavino eventually got up and sighed. This was already weird for him, and now he had to find a room to be able to sleep in. He didn't know if any were occupied and some people were downstairs so knocking wasn't a good idea.

"Great, how am I supposed to find my room now?" Gavino mumbled to himself, trying to think of a solution. Gavino came up with barely any options, so he decided on...
111121.title: Apology Accepted

choices: Kyoka Jiro smiling uncontrollably with a recorder, who recorded the entire song.
Kyoka Jiro confused by the song yet also finding joy from hearing it.
Izuku Midoriya with his notebook and pen, writing more about Quirks.
1111213.content:
...just going to the roof and singing his songs that he loves to sing. Gavino smiled as he enjoyed some of his songs that he was thinking of singing. He then pulled out his phone and reopened a Google Doc he had made for when he found a new Quirk he liked to use/copy. Or really just useful Quirks in general and also put a link to them so he could pull up a website or article that would give him the details he needed to Perfect Copy that Quirk.

Gavino then made his way to the roof, oblivious and unknowing that someone was behind him and following him.
______________________________________________________


Gavino made his way up to the roof and smiled as he breathed in fresh air. He liked the foreign smell of Japan's air, and probably because he liked Japan in general. Sure, there were downsides, but he liked Japan as a whole.

He made his way over to one corner of the roof and tried to remember how one of the students in his class's Quirk worked.

"I think her Quirk let her create anything non-organic," Gavino said aloud, trying to remember how Momo's Quirk worked. "But she needed to remember structure formulas and also have enough lipids to sacrifice to make the object too." Sadly, Gavino didn't know chemical format for a wooden chair, so he simply just did the obvious thing.

He got on his back and layer on the roof, looking at the sky. He then broke out in chorus after a few seconds of some starting music.

*Nobody's Watching* by Hollywood Undead, Album *Five*.

Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing.

I feel like I'm sinking, I feel like I'm reaching, for something that's out of my grasp, when I think I got it reality sinks in. On the dark side of the moon, just give me my space. 'Cause I got a list of mistakes all written in ink I won't get to erase. If I counted my blessings, I could spend my whole life counting, 'cause truthfully nothing is too late to fix, be the Blackbird on the White Album. And if I have so much to say, then why would I pipe down then? 'Cause life's getting shorter and shorter, so sing for the moment right now then.

It's times like this I feel I'm on the pavement. It's like my heart's so numb. (Oh-oh-oh.) Then I grab that book and turn the pages, and see how far I've come.

And just sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing!

I feel like I'm peaking, I become a beast when, I dig deep inside of myself and let it all out when I conquer these demons! It gives me the freedom. I'm breaking away from these chains. I'm embracing the change and finding the courage to face all this pain.
Wealth gives help while the poor die young. It is what is, I won't hold my tongue. Dad died poor, what did that give me? Strength inside, now the question lies, how you measure my value, I wonder. 'Cause I've reached the clouds from the gutter. If it's by heart, then I'm breaking the bank. Add up what matters, now do the numbers.

It's times like this I feel I'm on the pavement. It's like my heart's so numb. (Oh-oh-oh.) Then I grab that book and turn the pages, and see how far I've come.

And just sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing!

Like there's nobody listening, like there's nobody listening
Like there's nobody listening, but the whole world's watching
Like there's nobody listening, like there's nobody listening
Like there's nobody listening, but the whole world's watching
But the whole world's watching!

Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing!
Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody watching.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing, sing like there's nobody listening.
Sing!

Gavino finished singing, and felt somewhat better then he did earlier. He may have given away his location, or even made some people pause what they might've been doing since he believed he might accidentally copied a Quirk called "Song Voice" which allows the user to sing a song and the music of the song would appear.

Gavino then heard something from the stairwell that led to this roof. Gavino, curious of what the noise was, walked towards the stairwell and found...
1111213.title: Sing Like There's Nobody Watching! Sing!

choices: The Next Day
11112132.content:
...Jiro, confused yet also emotionally moved by the song Gvaino just finished singing.

Gavino then mentally yelled, 'FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK!'

"Um, hi," Juro said awkwardly as she didn't know what to say.

"Hello," Gavino replied. ".....you heard it didn't you?" Jiro nodded and climbed three steps and faced Gavino on the roof. "Well, I felt like it wasn't going to be a secret forever."

"A secret? You mean your singing?" Jiro asked.

"Yes..." Gavino said, looking at the ground, as he never really makes eye contact with anyone.

"Why do you want it to be a secret? It sounds good," Jiro complimented.

Gavino was shocked by this response, and he remembered what happened when he first started singing English songs in Japan.

*6 Years Ago*


Nobody Likes Me by Deuce (At 4:13 on Spotify)


"Nobody likes me, no one likes me. Cause I don't like them! Uh huh, I don't, nu uh. Nobody likes me, no one likes me. Why? Cause I don't like them! Uh huh, I don't, nu uh," Gavino sang. "Now it's, much too late to say, your sorry. Don't care, what you think. Uh huh, I don't, nu uh. Now it's, much too late to say, your sorry. Don't care, what you think. Uh huh, I don't, nu uh."

Gavino then hummed the rest of the music, until where the song would end which he randomly guessed. Gavino smiled, as he then rounded the corner of the small intersection of roads that he walked so he could go to his home.

And then saw his school's bully, and his egotistic cronies.

Gavino knew many words for being 9. And of the many words he could have thought, he thought, 'Fuck.'

"Well, would you look at that," the bully said. "The foreigner is singing a stupid song that probably was meant to reassure him that everything was going to be fine in his sad excuse for a life!" The bully laughed, and so did his cronies.

"Leave me alone. I didn't do anything to you, have I?" Gavino said, only to flinch when the bully stepped closer.

"Shut up!" The bully shouted in his face. "Nobody cares about your opinion, much less about your stupid song!"

"For the record, I was singing a song about how nobody likes me, called 'Nobody Likes Me'. And also, leave me alone. I'd rather be on my way than-"

"SHUT UP!" The bully interrupted. Gavino's eye twitched in anger, but he immediately calmed himself. "I don't care if you were singing about how you feel lonely! So shut up!"

Gavino looked at his hands, which had gloves on them. He then grabbed his right hand, and took off the glove. "I'll give you a fair warning. Leave. Now." Gavino warned.

The bully's muscles then grew to four times their size. "Make me you damned foreigner!"

Gavino's anger got the better of him, and Gavino thrusted his hand at the bully.

Many tears were shed. From the bully's family, and also from Gavino himself. Not because of regret, but because of the pain he received when his parents found out.

*Present Time*


Gavino shuddered, and he grimaced. That wasn't one of his best days, maybe the worst. He hated the Quirk he had, and he wanted to take back that day, and change everything.

"Well, let's leave it at, I sang a song once and... I did something bad because of an insult from someone," Gavino looked away, and looked at fencing on the roof.

"Well, you honestly sound great when you can sung in English," Jiro said. "Honestly, I think I might want to check out the band you were singing."

Gavino looked up at Jiro, and looked at her face. Gavino could read faces pretty well, and he saw she was being sincere and truthful. "Well, they're the band called Hollywood Undead. And that song was from the album called, 'Five'. The song was 'Nobody Watching'," Gavino informed Jiro.

"Maybe you should you me a few of your favorites, and maybe I could show you some of my favorites. There also English, so I think you might know the bands," Jiro said as she held out her hand. "I'm Kyoka Jiro by the way."

Gavino looked at her hand and smiled as he looked back up at her. He grabbed her and (with his glove still on) shook it. "Gavino Heroesworth. Just call me Gavino though, it's easier that way."

Jiro smiled and they let go of his hand. "So, do you know where your room is?" She asked.

"Oh, well I was unsure of where my room would be, and I didn't want to accidentally open a door and find someone else's room, and I also wanted to avoid accidentally seeing someone change," Gavino admitted as he rubbed the back of his head.

Jiro sighed but smiled. "Let's go find Iida. He can help you find your room," she said.

Gavino smiled, and not half-heartedly. "Thanks."

The two walked down the stairs, and Gavino got situated into his new room. His stuff came later that day, and Gavino set up his room. He was doing a recount of today and smiled. "I guess I achieved a friend," he mumbled, before he fell asleep, waiting for tomorrow to come.
11112132.title: A Friend for Gavino, and a Flashback of Pain

choices: Ran into Toshinori Yagi in bandages.
Saw a fight break out between Bakugo and Tetsutetsu.
Saw Aizawa training Shinso with a capture weapon.
111121321.content:
The day proceeded normally for Gavino as he woke up from sleep in his new room, in his new school, with his new friends(?) with a question mark. Gavino had gotten up, got dressed and went to get breakfast, brush his teeth, deodorant yadayadayada.

What Gavino didn't expect was a breakfast made by his fellow classmates.

He first found out about it as a smell of sugar and syrup invaded his nose, waking up Gavino almost fully as he defended the stairs. "If my sense of nose-blindness can not work for once and I can actually smell for once, please tell me that my nose isn't lying to me like a little bitch and there are pancakes in the kitchen!"

His non-religious prayers were answered by memes.

He descended the last flight of stairs and he looked into the kitchen of his class's dorms. Sure enough, a student who he learned was named Rikido Sato was making pancakes in the kitchen. Almost the whole class was there sitting at one large oval shaped table eating and also talking.

"There room for another student?" Gavino asked as he walked up to the table, causing everyone to look at him. Minus Sato however, for he was concentrating on the pancakes.

"Hey, it's the new kid!" A male student named Eijiro Kirishima exclaimed as he saw Gavino. "Yeah man, there's still room for you! Come on, take a seat!"

Gavino was still slightly surprised at how opened his class,ages were since the transition to this class from his other shitty class. "Well, I guess I will." Gavino sat down in an empty chair next to Kirishima and Izuku.

"Hope you're ready to taste Sato's pancakes," Kirishima said as he rubbed his hands together and closed his eyes excitedly. "You haven't even heard of heaven until you've ate some of them! Oh, and I'm Eijiro Kirishima." Kirishima held out his hand to Gavino.

"I'm Gavino, and I'm pretty sure that I'm going nowhere close to heaven anytime soon with how the world's decided to be on me," Gavino joked half-jokingly, and also half-seriously. "But, if these pancakes can make one ascend to such a place even temporarily... well, I'll take some."

The class just stared at Gavino for a minute. "Nowhere near heaven?" Kaminari questioned as he lowered a newspaper he was reading. "Why would you say that?"

info.brief_description: You are in Class 1A of UA (You replace a student, for a reason). Now let's become a hero!
info.description:
Welcome to the world of My Hero Academia! This is an adventure with the most random and fun plot that you can make your own story! Luckily for you, you have two Quirks as you were lucky when you were born.

Quirk must haves:

1. Mass Changer
The user can alter the mass of a human, whether it's their part or their entire body. In doing so, the user can either shrink the person they are affecting, or make the person they are affecting bigger. This however only affects human skin, and will not effect clothes, electronics, accessories, liquids, or anything amongst the sort. Though the only thing that can be altered liquid-wise would be breast milk (in your own path, expansion or shrinking does not need to happen, but the Quirk Mass Changer must be mentioned with a reason why you are not going to use it). You've also been told that it makes girls/guys (depends on your character's gender) more attracted to you and love you the more you use it, though they believe they are doing it willingly (you may pair yourself with any female character in Class 1A, 1B, the Support Course, the League of Villains/Villains in general, civilian characters (Inko, Mitsuki, Rei Todoroki, and also Melissa Shield) (Eri is included, but must be more tame and friendly with her since she's 7 years old), and also pro heroes/pro hero teachers). It has no affect on your character's gender (if you're characters a guy, it won't affect another guy character).

2. Perfect Copy.
For those who choose not to use the first Quirk, you may rejoice as you were given a Perfect Copy Quirk! This quirk allows you to perfectly copy 1 quirk perfectly, and adds another to the total that you can learn and "forget" (in Pokémon terms, you can learn how to manipulate water but then find another Quirk to use and forget it, but you can remember it later) for every two years you've been alive (2 years equal 1 quirk, 4 years equal 2 quirks, and etc.)! You have no restraints on what Quirks you can copy (actually, you do, but more on that in the rules), and this is also the reason why you are in Class 1A in this story. You are also 15 by default.

Rules for this story:

1. If you chose to use your Quirk, Mass Changer, you are free to use it on anyone if your character builds a bond with that character to the point the character you're using your Quirk on is comfortable with you and sees you as more than a friend.

A simple guild line to follow for this is the following:
1: Acquaintances. 2: Friends. 3: Best Friends. 4: Something More. 5: Dating. 6: Doing Anything With Each Other (No Turning Back).

2: You may have your character dating multiple people of their opposite gender. I don't care whether you call it a harem or a polyamory, or if it's two people your character is dating. I really couldn't care less!

3: The Quirk Perfect Copy can not copy the following Quirks: All For One, Rewind (Eri's Quirk), One For All, Disintegrate (Tomura Shigaraki's Quirk), Super Intelligence (Nezu's Quirk), or Acid (Mina's Quirk). You can however copy any Quirk other than those, and also Quirks that belonged to deceased people (Nana Shimura is an example). Also, specific Quirks I will allow some to make up on the spot as long as it's not overpowered. You're already overpowered as is.

4: You may make up your own arcs for this story for your path! As long as it's somewhere in the MHA universe/Earth, I'll allow it. We can't have them going into space, besides a Moon Base if one chooses to make one, but that's as far as I'll let you guys go.

5: Murder is allowed. But please let it correspond with the plot of your arcs. We don't want random murders to happen.

Have I covered everything? Hmm...

(2/8/20: Another author has asked me why Mineta was removed for all of these things, and I realized (after a while) that others in Class 1A are somewhat useless and also that some aren't going to be useful at times, like Koda and Aoyama for their examples. So you can replace any character from 1A if you want! I'm alright with any reason you choose!)

Probably.

So now! Start your story in the wonderful world of My Hero Academia, where you have special rules to follow so this story isn't insane!

The Author will now gives a shout out to Maria777 for the Mass Changer Quirk idea, and also for the reasons for Mass Changer's limits!
